article_title: Ted Cruz: Tom Brady Was Framed By Hillary Clinton
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX), a candidate for the Republican presidential nomination, made a campaign stop at the home of Massachusetts state Rep. Jim Lyons in Andover over the weekend and opened up by taking a jab at Democratic primary candidate Hillary Clinton saying she framed New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady in Deflate-Gate.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

“Tom Brady was framed and I have it on good authority that Hillary Clinton did it,” he joked. “Why do you think she deleted her emails?”
